issue.title: [Java] Provide functionalities to efficiently determine if a validity buffer has completely 1 bits/0 bits
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5881](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5881). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These utilities can be used to efficiently determine, for example, 
- If all values in a vector are null
- If a vector contains no null
- If a vector contains any valid element
- If a vector contains any invalid element
